segments.text: I can't bear you anymore . I am sick of your drinking . I am divorcing you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Don't do that to me , honey . Give me a chance , please . I make a solemn promise never to drink alcohol again .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How many chances should I give you ? I've given up on you !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Have a heart , honey . You know I am trying hard to quit drinking , don't you ? Just give me one more chance , please !
segments.speaker: S2
